articles.title: Murder hornets leave distinctive sex chemicals in their wake - Daily Mail
articles.description: It may be possible to track and kill the Asian giant hornet, also known as the 'murder hornet', says an expert at University of California San Diego. The insect can kill humans with a toxic sting.
articles.content:
It's the largest hornet in the world and one of the most invasive species threatening American crops today.
